text: The Fight for Freedom is a 1908 American silent western movie directed by D. W. GriffithThe Fight for FreedomTHE FIGHT FOR FREEDOM and stars Florence Auer, Arthur V. Johnson, and Kate Bruce. ==Actors== * Florence Auer as Juanita * Arthur V. Johnson as Pedro * Kate Bruce as Pedro's mother * John G. Adolfi * Edward Dillon as posse member * George Gebhardt as man in saloon / guard * Wallace McCutcheon Jr. * Anthony O'Sullivan as bartender * Robert G. Vignola ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1908 movies Category:1900s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: The Fight for Freedom
